Trails.Name: Lower Wanderer, West Meadows, Mike's Way
Old Log Rd, West Meadows, Mike's Way
Sun Bowl, Home Run, 91, Main Base Area

_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
12/28 2:52PM - Yet another stellar weekend at Stratton! East Byrnes Side coming online with incredible features and a halfpipe was quite the Holiday treat!

Heres the scoop on what's happening tonight! Head up to Grizzlys from 2-5pm for live music by Vinyl Vault. Additionally, the Lawson's Finest Liquids team will be in the building for promos and tastings from 2-5pm. Head to the main base lodge for free holiday kids crafts from 4:30-5:30pm while supplies last. Benedicts will be open with extended hours until 8pm so stop by and grab a bite to eat or a drink! We have plenty of Activities up and running including Tubing, Ice Skating, Climb, and Snowmobile Tours. Book online to secure your spot for tonight! 

Tonight, forecasts are calling for mixed precipitation consisting of everything from snow, ice, rain, and sleet. These conditions are expected to continue into Monday morning and turn into rain for the afternoon. Due to the incoming weather there will be lift and terrain delays for tomorrow. The tentative plan is to have 55 trails, all of which will be receiving a morning groom prior to opening. We plan on 12 lifts scheduled to spin at 8:30AM with several starting on wind and weather delays. There will be no early access tomorrow. Our Mountain Operations Team is dedicated to providing the best experience and conditions possible, with or without Mother Nature on our side. All hands are on deck as the entire grooming fleet will be out as late as possible and lift maintenance will be pulling all chairs in preparation for tomorrow. Thankfully, theres some light at the end of the tunnel with snow forecasted for tomorrow night and temperatures dropping to allow a solid window for snowmaking to resume. Be sure to check back to the report often for the most up to date information.
 
For those of you traveling late this evening or tomorrow morning, please drive safe! We hope you had a great weekend and stick around with us for the New Year. Ill catch up with you tomorrow for your morning report.

Safety Tip: Never duck a rope, they are there for a reason. 

The Coca-Cola Tube Park is now open! Reservations are recommended to save your spot while availability lasts. Tubing is available in 50 minute sessions starting at the top of each hour. Book now to secure your tickets! Please read the details and policies prior to purchasing your tickets. Hope to see you there!

Hungry? Luckily for you, Holiday week is in full swing with extended dining hours, live music, and special events keeping the Village looking lively. Check out our Holiday Week Dining, Aprs & Live Music Guide to see what's open, happening, and where the music is at.

The Holidays have arrived at Stratton! The Village is decorated with lights and the schedule is decked with events. Aprs heats up with live music at Grizzly's, cozy nights at Paint & Sip, and festive fun rolling all week long into a stacked lineup of New Years celebrations. Ring it in your way with family dinners, dancing it out at the Silent Disco, hiking up for a one of a kind fireworks view, or watching the fireworks light up the mountain from the base area. Theres something for everyone this Holiday week and we couldnt be more excited to celebrate with you! Click here to check out the upcoming Events Calendar.

Want to go on an adventure of a lifetime? Well, you're in luck, our Guided Snowmobile Tours are back! Explore Stratton after hours with friends and family on a tour to the summit. Be sure to book your spot now to guarantee it.

Stay and relish the Green Mountains! Stratton Real Estate is here to help with all your real estate needs. Make your sweet escape a reality.

Reliable cars are the name of the game; that is why we trust Oliver Subaru and Ford. Made for all seasons and all families, check out Oliver Ford and Oliver Subaru for year-round reliability.
